name: Cheaters Blackjack 21
description: CHEATERS BLACKJACK 21 adds the ‘Cheating’ twist to the classic game. Play 100% Fair or against Cheating CPU opponents to Win Match Play. Compete against Players Worldwide to Post the Best Match Totals. 6 Exciting Blackjack Game Modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Graphics card or greater Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A rare game were we are allowed to cheat :) Thx DEVS,Make us a poker game were we are allowed to cheat now please :)
